text: Ben Nighthorse Campbell (born April 13, 1933) is a Cheyenne-American politician. He was a U.S. Representative from 1987 to 1993, and a U.S. Senator from Colorado from 1993 to 2005. He was a member of the Democratic Party, until Campbell switched to the Republican Party on March 3, 1995. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Retrospective Editorial, Boulder Weekly (2008): "Cherry Pickers Lose Elections" Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Colorado Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
